statements: DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND temperature_setting = 22.5;
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 200 AND temperature_setting < 25.0;
